Hello,

I was trying to use PrivilegedAccessor.invoke to test some private
function. e.g. PrivilegedAccessor(class1Obj, "getName",null) for 
testing getName() function of Class A class1Obj.  However I always 
got the exception: java.lang.NoSuchMethodException: Invalid method

Pls let me know how to tackle this.

Thanks,
.Tuan.
